name: Hi, it's Robert Wang
tagline: May the SOURCE be with you
body:
##Summary
- Born in Chai-Yi & lives in Taipei
- Android Developer
- Raspberry Pi Amateur
- [Github](https://github.com/cyberrob)
- [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/164005/robert)

##Experience
- 2015 Working @ [Solda Inc](http://solda.io).
- 2013 Senior Engineer of Nortek Inc.
- 2011 Senior Engineer of Wozai Inc.
- 2007 Engineer of Internet software technology division, ICL, ITRI
- 2006 MS degree from Dep. Information management NCTU Taiwan
- 2004 BS degree from Dep. Information management FJU Taiwan

##Projects
- TravMate - Special prize of Galileo Competition 2009 
- "No more waiting bus" for keep user notified bus arrival
- Insyde® App Market Platform for Hybrid Netbook System
- [Jiepang for Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jiepang.android)
- [Buddycard Loyalty Program](https://www.facebook.com/TheBuddyCard)
- The 2or3 Chatting App
- Home Control App with VLC integrated for Android
- Home Control App for Embedded System

##Research
- Indoor navigation system and its application via web & mobile app
- ICL Paper Issue 131-利用G-Sensor及電子羅盤於手機定位之實驗

##Hobby Projects
- [Expired When](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.expired.v2) - [2010 Hami Apps Competition](http://www.emome.net/events/20100906webiframe/signup.html) 
- [Neatly - Log your belongings](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.robert.neatly) 
- [Localsgram - Find out Instagram posts around you.](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.s3xy.retrofitsample.app)
- [Facebook Usage Meter - a Chrome extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ejfikepnokkjcjhjkpppdbpiccgjmjkc/publish-accepted?hl=zh-TW&gl=TW)

##Cases
- [Newsspur](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.newsspur.android)
- [Bono Point](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bono.project)
- Buildant tablet App for construction site
- App Generator for bank dialing service
- ITRI Market Client for Tablet & Set Top Box
	
##Languages
Java, C#, HTML, Javascript, CSS, SQL, Qt/QML, Python
	
##Dev Tools
Intelli-J, Eclipse, Sublime, Maven, Gradle, Git, Vim, GenyMotion, [Androidkickstartr](http://androidkickstartr.com/)
	
##Having fun with
1. RaspberryPi
2. Playing Basketball & NBA Fantasy game
3. Playing Piano
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
